alert.note: Alert for Duval; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Duval, eastern La Salle, northeastern Webb, McMullen and southwestern Live Oak Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 414 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crowther to 10 miles north of Loma Alta to near Seven Sisters. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Three Rivers, Choke Canyon, Tilden, Calliham, Seven Sisters, Loma Alta, Cross, Zella, Fowlerton, Crowther, Simmons and Clegg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 70 and 79. US Highway 281 between mile markers 618 and 624. US Highway 59 between mile markers 732 and 754. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Duval; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb
